hero.name: Salama Malek
hero.heading: Hey! I'm Salama
hero.description: ITI graduate and skilled Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for software development. Seeking entry-level opportunities to apply technical expertise in MEAN stack, back-end and front-end programming, and mobile app development.

about.title: Available for Full Stack Projects
about.description: ITI graduate and skilled Full Stack Web Developer with a passion for software development. Committed to delivering innovative solutions and fostering growth in dynamic and collaborative environments. I specialize in MEAN stack development, but I'm also proficient in other technologies like Laravel, Ruby on Rails, and Django.

details.title: E-commerce Platform using MEAN Stack
details.description: Developed a full-featured e-commerce platform using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js. Implemented features including user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment processing integration.

details.title: Cross-platform Mobile Application
details.description: Built a cross-platform mobile application using React Native that allows users to track their fitness goals, record workouts, and connect with fitness trainers.

details.title: Admin Dashboard for Content Management
details.description: Created an intuitive admin dashboard using Angular for content management with features including user management, content creation, analytics, and reporting tools.

details.title: Educational Platform with Laravel
details.description: Developed an educational platform using Laravel that allows instructors to create courses, upload learning materials, and interact with students.

details.title: Blog Platform using MERN Stack
details.description: Created a blogging platform using MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js with features including user authentication, content creation, commenting, and social sharing.

details.title: Corporate Website using WordPress
details.description: Designed and developed a corporate website using WordPress with custom themes and plugins to meet specific business requirements.

allService.title: Full Stack Development
allService.subTitle: Expert in MEAN stack development, building complete web applications with MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js.

allService.title: Front-End Development
allService.subTitle: Creating responsive, interactive user interfaces using React, Angular, Vue.js, and other modern front-end technologies.

allService.title: Mobile App Development
allService.subTitle: Building cross-platform mobile applications using React Native with focus on performance and user experience.

allService.title: Content Management
allService.subTitle: Implementing CMS solutions using WordPress with custom themes and plugins to meet specific client requirements.

allService.title: UI/UX Design
allService.subTitle: Creating intuitive and engaging user experiences through modern design principles, wireframing, and prototyping.

allExperience.companyDescription: Leading the development of scalable web applications using the MERN stack. Responsible for architecting and implementing new features, mentoring junior developers, and ensuring code quality and performance.
Developed and maintained client websites and web applications using React, Node.js, and GraphQL. Collaborated with designers and project managers to deliver high-quality digital products.
Assisted in the development of front-end components and back-end APIs for various web projects. Gained hands-on experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and agile development methodologies.
Worked with the data engineering team to build and maintain data pipelines. Developed scripts for data processing and analysis, contributing to the improvement of data quality and accessibility.
Specialized in creating responsive and interactive user interfaces using React and Vue.js. Led a small team of frontend developers, focusing on code quality, performance, and UI/UX best practices.
Focused on server-side logic, database management, and API development using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Ensured the scalability and reliability of the back-end infrastructure.

Successfully completed various web development and software projects on Khamsat, providing tailored digital solutions to clients with a focus on quality, communication, and client satisfaction. Key contributions include collaborating with clients to understand requirements and deliver customized solutions, developing websites, applications, and other services across different technologies, and ensuring timely delivery and high client satisfaction through efficient processes and clear communication.

Supported project management tasks, combining programming expertise with client communication to deliver IT solutions. Collaborated with teams to ensure project milestones were achieved efficiently and effectively.
Conducted coaching sessions to enhance IT students' skills in programming and development frameworks, providing practical project guidance and career advice for job readiness.

allTestimonial.reviewText: Salama's expertise in full-stack development was instrumental in the success of our project. His ability to translate complex requirements into a functional and elegant solution is truly impressive. A top-tier developer.

Working with Salama was a great experience. He was responsive, professional, and attentive to details. His technical skills are impressive, and he was able to recommend solutions that we hadn't considered. We'll definitely work with him again on future projects.

As a coach, Salama has helped many of our students develop practical skills that are highly valued in the industry. His teaching approach combines theory with hands-on projects, which has resulted in improved job placement rates for our graduates.
Salama is a reliable and talented developer. He consistently delivers high-quality work and is always willing to go the extra mile to ensure the project's success. I highly recommend him.

sectionHeading.title: Discover my work, skills, and achievements in one comprehensive showcase.

allProjects.title: IntervueAI
allProjects.subTitle: Real-time mock interviews with AI, no forms or clicks just natural, personalized conversations.

details.title: AI-Powered Interview Platform
details.description: An innovative platform that conducts real-time mock interviews using AI. Features natural conversation flow, personalized feedback, and comprehensive interview analytics. Built with modern web technologies and integrated with OpenAI's GPT models for realistic interview scenarios.

allProjects.title: E-Commerce Platform
allProjects.subTitle: Full-featured online marketplace with advanced payment processing and inventory management.

details.title: MEAN Stack E-Commerce Solution
details.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with the MEAN stack. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing with Stripe, order management, and admin dashboard. Includes real-time notifications and responsive design.

allProjects.title: TaskFlow Manager
allProjects.subTitle: Collaborative project management tool with real-time updates and team communication features.

details.title: Real-time Project Management Platform
details.description: A modern project management tool that enables teams to collaborate effectively. Features include real-time updates, task assignment, progress tracking, team chat, file sharing, and comprehensive reporting. Built with React frontend and Node.js backend with WebSocket integration.

allProjects.title: Weather Analytics Dashboard
allProjects.subTitle: Advanced weather data visualization with predictive analytics and interactive charts.

details.title: Interactive Weather Data Visualization
details.description: A sophisticated weather analytics dashboard that provides comprehensive weather data visualization. Features include interactive charts, predictive analytics, historical data comparison, and real-time weather updates. Built with D3.js for advanced data visualization.

allProjects.title: Social Media Analytics
allProjects.subTitle: Comprehensive social media monitoring and analytics platform with sentiment analysis.

details.title: AI-Powered Social Media Analytics
details.description: An advanced social media analytics platform that monitors multiple platforms and provides insights through AI-powered sentiment analysis. Features include trend analysis, competitor tracking, engagement metrics, and automated reporting. Built with React frontend and Django backend.

allProjects.title: Mobile Fitness Tracker
allProjects.subTitle: Cross-platform fitness tracking app with workout plans and progress monitoring.

details.title: Cross-platform Fitness Tracking App
details.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking mobile application built with React Native. Features include workout tracking, progress monitoring, nutrition logging, social features, and personalized workout plans. Includes offline functionality and real-time synchronization.
